arStrings.szText: {c_important}Bone Spear{/c} breaks into {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} bone shards when it is destroyed, dealing {c_number}{payload:BONE_SHARD}{/c} damage each.
{c_important}Bone Spear{/c} makes the first enemy hit {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Bone Spear{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance. If {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} primary projectile Critically Strikes, it fires {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} additional bone shards upon being destroyed.
